misc: Operates the Hector organization's digital media properties
Gotten increasingly close to winning the Hector Trophée but hasn't quite gotten it done yet
biography: Lasse, a familiar face from Tapiola Golf, is a dedicated participant in the Hector Trophée, known for his sharp wit and engaging personality off the course. He is a key figure behind the scenes, skillfully managing the Hector organization's digital media properties with a keen eye for detail.

With eight past appearances, Lasse is set to make his ninth showing at Hector Trophée 2025. Each year, he demonstrates unwavering commitment and a sportsmanlike attitude that resonates with fellow competitors and fans alike.

While the coveted Hector Trophée title has remained just out of reach, Lasse has been getting increasingly close to capturing the coveted title. His determination and continued presence in the competition make him one to watch.
